name: Forbidden Still - VR ESCAPE GAME
description:
In the nineteenth century England, the famous Octopure Distillery, a factory renowned in the making of the prestigious Spirit Keepers whisky, practices dark activities in secret. Over the years, it has developed a shadow network in order to sell its moonshine alcohol and thus crush any competition in the market. An employee with suspicions decides to call on a discreet detective who was one of the few women working in this field, for little recompense.

In this VR Escape, embody this detective and investigate this old Victorian distillery, suspected of whisky smuggling. After having infiltrated the factory, explore the area in search of clues in order to solve various riddles and thus discover the truth beyond the door ...

Made by The Grougroup Team : ANSEL Rémi, CHATELET Roman, GUILLON Orlane, FRANCESCHINI Jade

DISCLAIMER : For the moment, this game is only available on Meta Quest device, connected to a "VR Ready" Computer. We've planned to make it available for other VR devices, with a Standalone Version as a bonus for compatible headsets.
